data:query.name: molQuery
data:query.data:static-query: SELECT DISTINCT mat.materialid, struc.moleculeid, mol.molecule, bingo.cansmiles(mol.molecule) AS smiles FROM materials AS mat JOIN material_indices AS matidx ON mat.materialid = matidx.materialid JOIN structures AS struc ON mat.materialid = struc.id JOIN molecules AS mol ON struc.moleculeid = mol.id JOIN aclists AS acl ON mat.aclist_id = acl.id JOIN acentries AS ace ON acl.id = ace.aclist_id JOIN memberships AS acem ON ace.member_id = acem.group_id JOIN projects AS p ON mat.projectid = p.id JOIN usersgroups AS u ON mat.owner_id = u.id WHERE ace.permread AND (acem.member_id = ${paramCurrentUserId} OR (acem.member_id = ${paramOwnerId} AND mat.owner_id = ${paramCurrentUserId})) AND COALESCE(NULLIF(true, ${paramUserName}::VARCHAR IS NOT NULL), u.name = ${paramUserName}) AND COALESCE(NULLIF(true, ${paramDescription}::VARCHAR IS NOT NULL), matidx."value" ILIKE ${paramDescription}) AND COALESCE(NULLIF(true, ${paramProjectId}::VARCHAR IS NOT NULL), p.name = ${paramProjectName}) AND COALESCE(NULLIF(true, ${paramMolQuery}::VARCHAR IS NOT NULL), substructure(mol.molecule, ${paramMolQuery})) AND COALESCE(NULLIF(true, ${paramMaterialId}::INTEGER IS NOT NULL), mat.materialid = ${paramMaterialId});
